title: AI Godmothers: Pioneering Women Leading the Way in Artificial Intelligence
description: The push for gender equality in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) fields continues to gain momentum, with a particular focus on increasing female representation in the burgeoning field of artificial intelligence (AI). Kriti Sharma, a technology enthusiast leveraging AI to transform legal work, emphasizes the need for diverse voices in shaping the future of […]

title: Bitcoin developers gifted nearly $4m by Coinbase
description: Coinbase has stepped forward with a hefty $3.6 million contribution to Bitcoin developers. This contribution was made through Brink, a nonprofit organization, known for its commitment to nurturing talent within the Bitcoin blockchain ecosystem. The donation was made without any preconditions, earmarked to bolster the efforts of engineers dedicated to enhancing the Bitcoin blockchain’s open-source […]
